name: LiarTale
description:
Once upon a time, an elderly gentleman gathered his grandchildren around him and shared the most thrilling adventure of his lifetime. His tale described his journey through dark caves, wild forests, and thick grasslands. With the aid of his trusty fireball power ups and double jumps, he made it all the way to a fierce and mighty dragon. This is where his true destiny awaited... And it was all just a lie.

This game was made for the community game jam 2019. If you liked the game, you maybe want to subscribe to this YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbUldyJ0W-7B8spckDewC9g

Made by:

Zomk and SunnyNight
